name: Sentient Magic Item Traits
guidance: Create the item's persona like an NPC, with special exceptions below.
Abilities: choose Int/Wis/Cha or roll 4d6 (drop lowest) for each score.
Alignment: choose or roll on the Sentient Item's Alignment table.
Communication: choose or roll on the Sentient Item's Communication table.
Senses: choose or roll on the Sentient Item's Senses table.
Special Purpose: choose or roll on the Sentient Item's Special Purpose table; misalignment can trigger conflict.
